name: wring
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to hold something tightly with both hands and twist it by turning your hands in opposite directions
(also wring out) to twist a cloth or piece of clothing with your hands to remove water from it: She wrung out the shirt and hung it out to dry. wring something's neck
to kill a bird or other animal by twisting and breaking its neck: I hated doing it but I had to wring their necks or they'd have suffered long, agonising deaths.
